bug.author: shouwangzhe
bug.description: Traceback (most recent call last): File "preprocess.py", line 40, in parse_queue = Queue(maxsize=max_queue_size + num_tokenize) File "/home/work/opdir/lvpengbin/soft/paddle_internal_release_tools/idl/paddle/output/python27-gcc482/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/init.py", line 217, in Queue from multiprocessing.queues import Queue File "/home/work/opdir/lvpengbin/soft/paddle_internal_release_tools/idl/paddle/output/python27-gcc482/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 48, in from .synchronize import Lock, BoundedSemaphore, Semaphore, Condition File "/home/work/opdir/lvpengbin/soft/paddle_internal_release_tools/idl/paddle/output/python27-gcc482/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/synchronize.py", line 59, in " function, see issue 3770.") ImportError: This platform lacks a functioning sem_open implementation, therefore, the required synchronization primitives needed will not function, see issue 3770.
